name: Controlled useState
description: Add-item form with keyboard shortcuts support (Enter to submit, Escape to clear) using controlled components with useState and useRef hooks
approach: Uses React's useState hook to manage items list and input value. Implements keyboard event handling with useRef for focus management and useEffect for automatic focus. Provides console logging for keyboard shortcuts.
features: Enter key to submit form with validation
Escape key to clear input field
Console logging in required format: 'Submit: Enter' or 'Clear: Escape'
Automatic focus management after adding items
Bootstrap form styling with responsive design
Items list with numbering and timestamps
Statistics panel with item counts and averages
